name: XmlPlus xsd2cpp : C++ XML Data Binding
short_description: Provides XML Data Binding for C++ through XML Schema. Features: a) xsd2cpp - generates C++ XML Objects(X/O mapping) b) XML I/O ie. marshalling-unmarshalling(serialization-deserialization) c) roundtrip retains processing instructions and comments
summary: c++ xml data binding tool (free - lgpl)
